name: Wanted (StefanJo)
description:
HEY SHERIFFS! 

Wanted is a reaction game where you have to almost perfectly time your reaction in order to become the Sheriff of the Wild West! Government will pay you for killing your enemies, but be careful, you will also become a face on one of those wanted posters!

HOW TO PLAY:

Duel consists of three phases marked with three different sounds:

  • Ready phase,
  • Steady phase,
  • Shoot phase

Once you hear that the shoot phase has started press space key as fast as you can!

First one that comes to 3 wins, wins the duel!

CONTROLS:

Single player: SPACE KEY - SHOOT

Two player: 
A - first player shoot
L - second player shoot
